sentences.en: All our previous ideas are now in the melting - pot ; our jobs are bound to change radically.
sentences.cn: 我们从前的一切观念都正在改变, 我们的工作肯定要有很大变动.

sentences.en: CRM is not new, but the Internet radically alters its dynamic.
sentences.cn: CRM不是什么新东西, 但因特网急剧地改变了对它的需求.

sentences.en: EPA's approach to settlement changed radically during the early implementation of Superfund.
sentences.cn: 在实施"特级储备"的初级阶段,环境保护署对和解的态度发生了根本的改变.

sentences.en: Galileo departed radically from the Greeks.
sentences.cn: 伽利略根本上不同于希腊人.

sentences.en: I moved immediately after the election to pare down radically the size of the executive branch.
sentences.cn: 大选后,我立即采取行动,大肆削减行政部门的人员.

sentences.en: It is important to point out that laws and trends are radically different things.
sentences.cn: 有必要指出,规律和趋势是根本不同的两回事.

sentences.en: Most radically, some states are considering legalising the drug completely.
sentences.cn: 最为激进的是, 有些州正在考虑将毒品完全法律化.

sentences.en: Relativity and quantum mechanics have radically altered our picture of nature.
sentences.cn: 相对论和量子力学已经从根本上改变了我们对大自然的看法.

sentences.en: The ideological make-up of the unions is now radically different from what it had been.
sentences.cn: 协会的思想观念与过去截然不同。

sentences.en: The meat market can continue only if it is radically overhauled to conform with strict European standards.
sentences.cn: 肉类市场只有经过彻底的大检查，严格遵守欧洲标准，才能继续营业。

sentences.en: The original text has been modified so radically that it is barely recognizable.
sentences.cn: 原文改动得如此彻底,几乎面目全非.

sentences.en: The philosophy of aviation maintenance training is changing -- radically.
sentences.cn: 航空维护培训的理念从根本上发生了变化.

sentences.en: There is only a formal resemblance between the two systems; they are in fact radically different.
sentences.cn: 这两种体系只是在表面上有某种相似之处, 其实根本不同.

sentences.en: Things have to change, and change radically, in our economy and how we live our lives.
sentences.cn: 我们的经济和我们的生活方式必须改变，而且要从根本上改变。

sentences.en: When they are active, protein molecules may double over or twist into radically different shapes.
sentences.cn: 当这些蛋白质有活性时, 蛋白质分子可能折叠或扭转成截然不同的形状.

words.tran_cn: 基础；激进分子；[物化] 原子团；[数] 根数
根本上；彻底地；以激进的方式

trans.tran_cn: 根本地，彻底地，完全地，激进地
